text: SCS Software s.r.o. is a Czech video game development company based in Prague, Czech Republic. It mainly makes simulation games for Microsoft Windows, macOS, and Linux. == Games == === Games developed === Title Platform(s) Initial release Hunting Unlimited Microsoft Windows Hard Truck: 18 Wheels of Steel 18 Wheels of Steel: Across America Hunting Unlimited 2 Hunting Unlimited 3 18 Wheels of Steel: Pedal to the Metal OceanDive 18 Wheels of Steel: Convoy Hunting Unlimited 4 18 Wheels of Steel: Haulin' Bus Driver Microsoft Windows, OS X, iOS Deer Drive Microsoft Windows Hunting Unlimited 2008 18 Wheels of Steel: American Long Haul Hunting Unlimited 2009 Euro Truck Simulator Microsoft Windows, OS X Hunting Unlimited 2010 Microsoft Windows 18 Wheels of Steel: Extreme Trucker German Truck Simulator UK Truck Simulator 18 Wheels of Steel: Extreme Trucker 2 Trucks & Trailers Scania Truck Driving Simulator Microsoft Windows, OS X Euro Truck Simulator 2 Microsoft Windows, OS X, Linux American Truck Simulator ==References== Category:1997 establishments in Europe Category:Video game companies of Europe Category:Organizations based in Prague Category:Companies of the Czech Republic
title: SCS Software
